about_the_game:
The soundtrack for Tumbleweed Express contains all in-game music files as well as some select bonus music.

1. The Beginning (Title Theme)
2. Down in Cactus Downs
3. Welcome to the Warehouse
4. The Warehouse
5. Interlude
6. Frontier on Rails
7. Drills
8. Why'd It Have To Be Drills
9. Where No Train Has Gone Before (Maybe)
10. Shovel Queen
11. Teal Sea
12. Interlude Redux
13. Zugang zum Berg
14. Spitze der Schöpfung
15. Götterdämmerung
16. The Tumbleweed Express Rolls On (Credit Theme)
17. Where No Train Has Gone Before (Bonus Music)
18. Mysterious (Bonus Music)
19. Dirigibaus Musical Scratchpad (Bonus Music)
20. X & D (Bonus Music)
21. Xenia Musical Scratchpad (Bonus Music)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU @ 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD 4000
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Recond3Di
  • Additional Notes: Development Test Device

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mavericks 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU @ 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD 4000
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Recond3Di
  • Additional Notes: Development Test Device

name: Tumbleweed Express Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU @ 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Blaster Recond3Di
  • Additional Notes: Development Test Device

short_description: The soundtrack for Tumbleweed Express contains all in-game music files as well as some select bonus music.
